arts.ttl: Valencia vs. Real Oviedo postponed due to risk of torrential rain and floods
arts.sum: The LALIGA Matchday 7 game between Valencia and Real Oviedo at Mestalla, scheduled for this Monday, has been postponed until Tuesday due to a red alert for the risk of torrential rain and flooding in the province of Valencia.

arts.ttl: Valencia vs. Real Oviedo (30 de Sep., 2025) Resultados en Vivo
